comment: Great professor. Kind, funny, and fair grader. I'll make this clear, he doesn't make things easy, but he doesn't make things hard either. He's a fair professor who grades fairly and makes it easy to succeed.
Terrible professor, does NOT hear you out and believes anything someone will say. Will not give you a chance and just assumes what he feels like hearing out. Terrible.

He makes learning so much fun! You don't need to know anything about the software before the class because his projects actually help you learn and they don't feel hard or rushed. One group project, the rest are individual, easy to access outside of class, 2 free absences. Willing to work with you on all projects. Take him if you get the chance.

He is a great Professor!! He is very kind, very knowledgeable, and is a great teacher. He is one of my favorite professors at KSU :) I highly recommend taking this class if you are getting into music production. They teach you the basics of production in Logic, and they also have an advanced class if you want to dive deeper into music production.
Professor Howes does a good job at communicating with the students and giving good feedback on their work. He is also esay to communicate with. Would definitely recommend!
Danny is my favorite professor at KSU. If you have any opportunity to take a class with him, do it. He works really well with students and is really funny. This guy is awesome

Danny is so cool. He is probably THE coolest professor I have ever had. He used to be a traveling John Lennon in a Beatles Cover band and now he teaches audio production and other Mebus classes alongside Keith. Mebus is amazing. I recommend it to everyone interested in working in the entertainment industry in ANY way.
